email_content:
Hello Sunny Days families,

This past week, our budding artists collaborated on a colorful mural that celebrates friendship and creativity. The children brainstormed ideas together, mixed bright paints, and proudly added their individual touches. We can’t wait for you to see it displayed in our classroom entrance!

Looking ahead, we’re excited to roll out a new “Buddy System” designed to strengthen peer connections and encourage children to look out for one another. More details will follow soon, and you’ll begin to hear your child talk about their new “buddy.”

Thank you, as always, for your continued support. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

Warmly,
Ms. Jane
Sunny Days Childcare Center
